record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 1908
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 1908 -- (Senate - September 10, 2007)

[Page: S11352]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 1908 is at the desk.

record.chair: The clerk will read the bill by title for the first time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 1908) to amend title 35, United States Code, to provide for patent reform.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask for its second reading but object to my own request.

record.chair: The bill will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.
